attributes.action: Introduce Death Penalty for Murderers, Child Sex Offenders and Treason
attributes.additional_details:
We live in extreme times and confidence in domestic law enforcement is at an all time low amidst a growing (and established) generations of domestic and foreign born criminals 'doing as they please' without a care of the law abiding and hard-working 'silent majority' - and these perpetrators have mindsets that are so at odds with the majority - it is contributing to the degeneration of UK society.  

Capital Punishment for Murderers, Child Sex Offenders and Treason is the solution and deterrent.
attributes.background: The UK government should remove itself from the UN Declaration of Human Rights in order to enable a new bill to be passed on behalf of the British people to enact and re-establish Capital Punishment for Murderers, Child Sex Offenders and Treason.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585532
